li.p: 24 hour Crisis Lines: 800-247-2809 (Sioux Trails) 877-399-3040 (Southcentral Crisis Center/Mobile Team)
Crisis Text Line - Text 741741 to connect with a trained Crisis Counselor

strong.span: The Butterfield-Odin Public School provides a safe, welcoming and challenging learning environment for all students where differences are assets. We partner with families to instill the qualities whereby all students are engaged in and accountable for their learning.

strong.em:
SCHOOL PHONE # 507-956-2771/ FAX # 507-956-3431
440 Hubbard Ave/ PO BOX 189
Butterfield MN 56120
Butterfield-Odin Public School : 8:12 am-3:00 pm = K-12 Students
WEDNESDAYS: Students dismissed at 1:55 pm. For staff P.L.C. meetings.

br.strong: PRESCHOOL age 4: meet 5 days a week Monday-Friday 8:00 -11:15 am/age 3: meet 3 afternoons Monday,Tuesday,Thursday 12:30-3:00 pm.

div.br:
P.L.C. DAY: WEDNESDAY'S starting September 25. Students will be dismissed at 1:55 pm. Please see school calendar.
HEALTHY SNACK. . .
popcorn will be sold for 75 cents after school along with other "healthy snacks". They will be sold during the 2019-2020 school year.
YEARBOOKS 2019-2020 ARE ON SALE! Also available to purchase 2018-2019! $35.00 Stop at the District Office or call 507-956-2771.
